name: split
description: Creates array of new `pipeline` segments that run in parallel

description: Iterates pipeline callbacks via generator function

name: merge
description: Merges multiple pipes into single output

name: close
description: Terminates input on `pipeline` segment. This is irrevocable

name: throttle
description: Informs `pipeline` to rate limit notifications based on time interval

name: sample
description: Returns product of Nth occurrence of `pipeline` execution

name: tap
description: Provides current state of `pipeline` output. alias for toJSON

name: promise
description:
Convenience Method for Promise based flows.
Writes data to `pipeline` and wraps observer in Promise

/* ############################################################################
The MIT License (MIT)

Copyright (c) 2016 - 2019 Van Schroeder
Copyright (c) 2017-2019 Webfreshener, LLC

Permission is hereby granted, free of charge, to any person obtaining a copy
of this software and associated documentation files (the "Software"), to deal
in the Software without restriction, including without limitation the rights
to use, copy, modify, merge, publish, distribute, sublicense, and/or sell
copies of the Software, and to permit persons to whom the Software is
furnished to do so, subject to the following conditions:

The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all
copies or substantial portions of the Software.

THE SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED "AS IS", WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY,
FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE
AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES OR OTHER
LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM,
OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE SOFTWARE OR THE USE OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE
SOFTWARE.

############################################################################ */
//== Polyfills Object.assign
if (typeof Object.assign !== "function") {
    Object.assign = require('object.assign/polyfill')();
}
export {Model as Model} from "./Model";
export {Pipeline as Pipeline} from "./Pipeline";

content:
{
  "name": "datamatic",
  "description": "Observable & Validatable Data Models and Pipelines",
  "homepage": "https://webfreshener.github.io/datamatic",
  "author": "Van Schroeder <van@webfreshener.com>",
  "version": "0.9.0",
  "main": "./dist/datamatic.node.js",
  "module": "./dist/datamatic.umd.js",
  "licenses": [
    {
      "type": "MIT",
      "url": "http://www.opensource.org/licenses/MIT"
    }
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "https://github.com/Webfreshener/datamatic.git"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest",
    "cover": "jest --coverage && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | codacy-coverage --token \"$CODACY_ID\"",
    "build-test": "webpack --mode development; npm test",
    "build": "webpack --mode production",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc",
    "report": "$HOME/Library/Caches/Codacy/coverage-reporter/11.9.2/codacy-coverage-reporter report"
  },
  "files": [
    "index.js",
    "dist/*"
  ],
  "keywords": [
    "rxjs",
    "json-schema",
    "validation",
    "validatable",
    "observable",
    "proxy",
    "model",
    "json",
    "data",
    "object",
    "array",
    "hash",
    "map",
    "dictionary"
  ],
  "devDependencies": {
    "@babel/cli": "^7.12.10",
    "@babel/core": "^7.12.10",
    "@babel/plugin-transform-runtime": "^7.12.10",
    "@babel/preset-env": "^7.12.11",
    "@babel/preset-react": "^7.12.10",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.12.5",
    "@webpack-cli/init": "^1.1.3",
    "ajv": "^7.0.3",
    "ajv-formats": "^1.5.1",
    "babel-loader": "^8.2.2",
    "chai": "^4.2.0",
    "codacy-coverage": "^3.0.0",
    "deep-equal": "^1.0.1",
    "es6-weak-map": "^2.0.2",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-accessor-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-exclude-source-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "jest": "^26.6.3",
    "jest-babel-istanbul": "^0.1.0",
    "jest-each": "^26.6.2",
    "jshint": "^2.12.0",
    "json-schema-migrate": "^1.0.0",
    "jsonpath": "^1.1.0",
    "lodash.merge": "^4.6.2",
    "mocha": "^6.2.3",
    "mocha-lcov-reporter": "^1.3.0",
    "object.assign": "^4.1.2",
    "ofs-utils": "^1.0.0",
    "rxjs": "^6.6.3",
    "rxjs-compat": "^6.6.3",
    "weakmap": "^0.0.6",
    "webpack": "^5.16.0",
    "webpack-cli": "^4.4.0",
    "webpack-rxjs-externals": "^2.0.0"
  },
  "jest": {
    "collectCoverage": true,
    "testPathIgnorePatterns": ["/integration/"],
    "coveragePathIgnorePatterns": [
      "/node_modules/",
      "/dist/",
      "/integration/"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
